topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54cc04e463687238389e0100#post_54cc04e463687238389e0100
Okay this isn't usually advised if you have a smartphone since it can mess with the screen but if you're a huge germaphobe like me you may want to take a chance.  Dab a little bit of rubbing alcohol onto a qtip and swab it around all the parts without openings then wipe it off. 
I've done it a few times without incident But I warn again, it can mess with touch screens.

EDIT: also turn it off before doing ANY of this
